channel.title: Balint Pekker | bpekker.dev
channel.description: A collection of 'concept' related posts | bPekker.dev

item.title: Simplifying Drupal Documentation
item.description: Are you new to the world of Drupal, eager to dive into its powerful capabilities, but encountering obstacles in the form of outdated tutorials and confusing documentation? You're not alone. Beginning your Drupal journey can feel like navigating uncharted territory, leaving many feeling frustrated before they even begin.
